EmailTemplate.subject: Upgrade to Turbonomic 6.1 for Application-Aware Workload Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With our recent launch of Turbonomic 6.1 we’ve hit a major milestone: application-aware SMART (Self-Managing, Anywhere, in Real-Time) workload automation for hybrid and multicloud infrastructure. That being said, I want to ensure you understand and leverage all the new functionality that’s available to you when you upgrade to Turbonomic 6.1 <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/6-1-highlight-reel]]>.
If you haven’t already upgraded or spoken with a member of the Turbonomic team, I’d like to offer you a free assessment of your environment through the lens of 6.1, walking your team through our improved product functionality, so you can benefit from:
- Maximized Reserved Instance Utilization in AWS – Many AWS customers struggle to maximize reserved instance capacity across their estate. Our 6.1 early adopter customers report seeing their cloud savings increase 3-5x with Turbonomic’s new market-leading RI optimization capabilities. Learn more <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/putting-the-ri-in-rightsize-with-turbonomic-6-1]]>. - Application-Aware Infrastructure Management –Turbonomic leverages AppDynamics data to drive better decisions and eliminate application performance risk due to infrastructure. Learn more <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/application-aware-infrastructure-with-cisco-appdynamics-and-turbonomic]]>. - Self-Managing Container Platforms – Turbonomic extends SMART workloads to Kubernetes, Red Hat OpenShift and Pivotal Cloud Foundry, enabling continuous optimization of container platforms at production-scale. Learn more <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1]]>. - Executive Dashboards – Customers have access to built-in dashboards showing the performance improvements and savings generated through Turbonomic. Learn more <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/executive-dashboards-in-turbonomic-6-1]]>.
If you are interested in exploring 6.1 with a Turbonomic engineer, please reply to my email so we can schedule some time.
Thank you for your loyalty to Turbonomic, we’re lucky to count you as a customer!
Best,
Steve Corndell GM and VP of Commercial Sales
